---
title: The Page Not Found
---

The page you asked for isn't here.<br> I can't say why for sure, I fear.[^1]<br> Most likely is that things got twisted,<br> And thus it never once existed<br> As spelled here in your address bar.<br> Try using search. You can't be far!

[^1]: Perhaps it's out there chasing dreams<br> Of fighting bears with laser beams?<br> Traversing climes extreme and high?<br> Perfecting crusts of apple pie?<br> Addressing crowds from center stage?<br> Protesting for a living wage?<br> Or maybe something not so thrilling,<br> Though still impressive and fulfilling:<br> Rejecting its entitlement<br> And seeking out enlightenment?
